name: Turn Based Pong
description:
The game follows by the classic pong. But it innovates in a way to implement a turn based approach for all turn based suckers like me.

In this version of pong. Instead of trying to stop the ball from passing through, you are challenged to predict the path through which the ball might go and place an obstacle in its path in a turned based manner.

So, its more of a turn based puzzle than classic pong.
